ToolStack

Privacy Policy

Welcome to ToolStack, where your privacy is not just respected — it's engineered into the product.

1. No Data Collection

We do not collect, store, or share any personal information. You can use all our tools without creating an account or sharing your identity.

2. Local-Only Processing

All conversions are handled locally using WebAssembly. This means nothing leaves your browser — no external requests, no APIs, no tracking scripts.

3. No Cookies. No Analytics.

We do not use cookies, pixels, fingerprinting, or analytics tools like Google Analytics. Your usage is your business, not ours.

4. No Ads, Ever

ToolStack is ad-free. Your focus should be on productivity, not dodging popups.

5. Optional Features (Future)

If we ever introduce features that involve limited data (like saving preferences or credits), it will be transparent, optional, and likely stored locally or securely on your own terms.

For any questions or feedback, you're always welcome to contact the developer.

← Back to Home
ToolStack

Serverless by Design. No Fluff. No BS. Built for real users, by an indie dev, using Rust and WebAssembly.
